name: Dolkroc
description:
This is a fun little game which I made during the 7-day Brackeys game jam (I totally did not do it at the end of the last 3 days hehe).

You are stuck in the middle of nowhere and spirits surround you. You can press Z to see them but only temporarily. Avoid them and make sure you don't TOUCH them. Memorize their positions and try to get around them as much as possible.

Font: Medieval Pixel

Art: MicroFantasy

Credits:

made by Vyomesh Jamwal
